long_description: The Thule Crossover 32L backpack combines dedicated organization for the work week, yet is roomy enough for a trip to the gym or the occasional weekend adventure. Rear organization compartment has an elevated laptop compartment for your 17 in. Macbook Pro(R) and a sleeve for your iPad(R). Plushly lined pocket stores your cell phone or iPod(R). Aluminum hardware and water-resistant fabrics combine to create a lightweight, durable bag. Roomy main compartment can house a change of clothes, books and bulky items. Heat-molded, crushproof top compartment protects your sunglasses, iPhone, portable electronics and other fragile gear. External Shove-it Pocket(TM) with compression straps provides additional quick storage for a jacket or newspaper. Bottom zippered pocket can easily accommodate your laptop's power source, an afternoon snack or other small accessories. Front bulk storage pocket provides easy access to your in-transit necessities. Side external pockets stretch to fit around a water bottle. Thule Crossover 32L backpack has padded back panel and shoulder straps, and an adjustable sternum strap.
short_description: The Thule Crossover 32L backpack combines dedicated organization for the work week, yet is roomy enough for a trip to the gym or the occasional weekend adventure.
